awful - old (because it's a word that evokes a sense of dread and negativity that we may associate with our later years)
failure - old (because it's a word that evokes a sense of disappointment and regret that can come with age and the realization that not everything in life is successful)
hurt - old (because it's a word that evokes a sense of pain and suffering that we may experience later in life).
